title: Claus Bury, landscape sculpture
creator_credit: David Corke, Crafts Council of Australia and Crafts Resource Productions
brief_description: This film shows Claus Bury, a German sculptor and jeweller, working with Australian tertiary sculpture students in workshop situations. The film looks in particular at his work in outdoor environments. Music by Geoffrey d’Ombrain and camera and editing by David Corke
creator_credit_for_label: David Corke, Crafts Council of Australia and Crafts Resource Productions
